title: Form With Input Fields And Validation

versions.prompt: Create a form with input fields and validation
versions.code:
import React from 'react';
import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/react';
import { 
  Stack, 
  TextInput, 
  PasswordInput, 
  Textarea, 
  Button, 
  Checkbox, 
  Select,
  Paper,
  Title,
  Group,
  Anchor
} from '@mantine/core';

const meta: Meta = {
  title: 'Generated/Registration Form',
  parameters: { layout: 'centered' },
  tags: ['autodocs'],
};

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj;

export const CompleteForm: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Paper shadow="sm" p="xl" style={{ width: 500 }}>
      <Stack gap="md">
        <Title order={2}>Create Account</Title>
        
        <TextInput
          label="Full Name"
          placeholder="John Doe"
          required
          withAsterisk
        />
        
        <TextInput
          label="Email"
          placeholder="your.email@example.com"
          type="email"
          required
          withAsterisk
        />
        
        <PasswordInput
          label="Password"
          placeholder="Your password"
          required
          withAsterisk
        />
        
        <PasswordInput
          label="Confirm Password"
          placeholder="Confirm your password"
          required
          withAsterisk
        />
        
        <Select
          label="Country"
          placeholder="Select your country"
          data={['United States', 'Canada', 'United Kingdom', 'Australia', 'Germany']}
          required
          withAsterisk
        />
        
        <Textarea
          label="Bio"
          placeholder="Tell us about yourself"
          minRows={3}
        />
        
        <Checkbox
          label="I agree to the terms and conditions"
        />
        
        <Group justify="space-between" mt="md">
          <Button variant="subtle">Cancel</Button>
          <Button variant="filled">Create Account</Button>
        </Group>
      </Stack>
    </Paper>
  ),
};

export const WithValidationErrors: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Paper shadow="sm" p="xl" style={{ width: 500 }}>
      <Stack gap="md">
        <Title order={2}>Sign Up</Title>
        
        <TextInput
          label="Username"
          placeholder="Enter username"
          required
          withAsterisk
          error="Username must be at least 3 characters"
        />
        
        <TextInput
          label="Email"
          placeholder="your.email@example.com"
          type="email"
          required
          withAsterisk
          error="Please enter a valid email address"
        />
        
        <PasswordInput
          label="Password"
          placeholder="Your password"
          required
          withAsterisk
          error="Password must be at least 8 characters and contain a number"
        />
        
        <PasswordInput
          label="Confirm Password"
          placeholder="Confirm your password"
          required
          withAsterisk
          error="Passwords do not match"
        />
        
        <Button variant="filled" fullWidth>Submit</Button>
      </Stack>
    </Paper>
  ),
};

export const LoginForm: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Paper shadow="sm" p="xl" style={{ width: 400 }}>
      <Stack gap="lg">
        <Title order={2}>Welcome Back</Title>
        
        <TextInput
          label="Email"
          placeholder="your.email@example.com"
          type="email"
          required
          withAsterisk
        />
        
        <PasswordInput
          label="Password"
          placeholder="Your password"
          required
          withAsterisk
        />
        
        <Group justify="space-between">
          <Checkbox label="Remember me" />
          <Anchor size="sm">Forgot password?</Anchor>
        </Group>
        
        <Button variant="filled" fullWidth>
          Sign In
        </Button>
      </Stack>
    </Paper>
  ),
};

export const ContactForm: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Paper shadow="sm" p="xl" style={{ width: 600 }}>
      <Stack gap="md">
        <Title order={2}>Contact Us</Title>
        
        <Group grow>
          <TextInput
            label="First Name"
            placeholder="John"
            required
            withAsterisk
          />
          
          <TextInput
            label="Last Name"
            placeholder="Doe"
            required
            withAsterisk
          />
        </Group>
        
        <TextInput
          label="Email Address"
          placeholder="your.email@example.com"
          type="email"
          required
          withAsterisk
        />
        
        <TextInput
          label="Phone Number"
          placeholder="+1 (555) 123-4567"
          type="tel"
        />
        
        <Select
          label="Subject"
          placeholder="Select a topic"
          data={['General Inquiry', 'Technical Support', 'Sales', 'Feedback', 'Other']}
          required
          withAsterisk
        />
        
        <Textarea
          label="Message"
          placeholder="How can we help you?"
          required
          withAsterisk
          minRows={4}
        />
        
        <Button variant="filled" fullWidth mt="md">
          Send Message
        </Button>
      </Stack>
    </Paper>
  ),
};
